Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020250 ZSQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Queens, Council District no. 28 to allow a 406 space public parking garage.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning Special Permit, CD#28, Queens (020250ZSQ)

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 020248 ZMQ, pursuant to §197-c nd §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 28.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning Map Changes,  CD#28, Queens (020248ZMQ)

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020249 ZSQ, pursuant to §197-c and 197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Queens, Council District no. 28 to allow acessory off-street parking spaces to be located without regard to zoning lot lines and to allow location of buildings without regard to applicable yard regulations.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning Special Permit CD# 28, Queens (020249ZSQ)
